column4: Is there any solution for an empty /proc/acpi/fan? also, when I try to echo an appropriate line to trip_points (which has only two entires, one at 95C and one at 100C) I get "permission denied" error, even though I am sudo'ing the command.
what is the command that you're using?
try echo -n "xx : xx : xx : xx : xx" | sudo tee trip_points
hi, I tried the commands you gave me, and I get xx:xx:xx:xx:xxtee trip_points: input/output error
